Breeding adult.description: Least Terns are smaller than Black Terns with paler back and wings. Least has a very slender yellow bill unlike Black Tern's black bill. Breeding Least Terns have a fully black cap with white forehead, whereas nonbreeding Black Tern has a small black cap surrounded by white and a dark ear spot.

Immature.description: Immature Least Terns are smaller and paler than Black Terns, which have dark gray-brown back and wings.

Nonbreeding adult.description: Forster's Terns are larger and paler gray above than Black Terns, with more slender wings and a deeply forked tail. Nonbreeding Forster's has a distinct black ear patch but lacks nonbreeding Black Tern's small black cap.
Common Terns are larger and paler gray above than Black Terns. Nonbreeding Common has more extensive black on the head than nonbreeding Black Tern.
